name: 003 (DanielJimenezMorales, Graco, Xavier2679, anaveragesketcher, Carlos Chamizo Cano, ruben4_ob, javijones00, Vicma)
name_original: 003 (DanielJimenezMorales, Graco, Xavier2679, anaveragesketcher, Carlos Chamizo Cano, ruben4_ob, javijones00, Vicma)
description:
003 is a short psychological horror game.

INTRODUCTION:

You have been sent to investigate Bunker 003, whose workers seem to have cut communications under mysterious circumstances. Find out what is going on.

Controls
  • Movement: AWSD
  • Camera: Mouse 
  • Select Item: mouse scroll
  • Use Item: F
  • Interact: E 
  • Run: Shift 
  • Pause: Escape key
